page.title: 14TOURISM/FARMING IN DUNS.
page.content: DUNS IS A CONVENIENT CENTRE FOR BORDER VISITORS. IT IS A MIXTURE OF OLD & NEW BUILDINGS. THE AREA IS ONE OF ROLLING HILLS, RIVERS, WOODS, FERTILE PLAINS & SCENIC BEAUTY OF INTEREST TO PHOTOGRAPHERS, ARTISTS, NATURALISTS & FISHERMEN, WALKERS & SPORTSMEN. EXCELLENT SPORTING FACILITIES EXIST. COUNTRY MANSIONS ATTRACT, TO VIEW THE BEAUTY OF A BYGONE AGE. REIVERS WEEK ENTERTAINS THROUGH PAGENT & SPORT. THE JIM CLARK MUSEUM ATTRACTS CAR RACING ENTHUSIASTS. HOTELS ATTRACT BY OFFERING BARGAIN HOLIDAYS OF ARRANGED VISITS & SPORTS. {TECHNOLOGY}IS USED IN FARM MACHINERY, SPRAYS, FERTILIZERS & BREEDING.COMPUTERS AID PLANNING & RECORDING OF INFORMATION. TECHNOLOGY HAS LED TO THE HIGHEST PRODUCTIVITY INCREASE IN ANY INDUSTRY SINCE THE WAR BY DEVELOPMENT OF NEW & BETTER CROPS.
